item.title: Attitude trousers
item.description: https://www.atelier-scammit.com/women/89-attitude.html Recommended fabrics Weight: light to medium-heavy (180 to 340 gsm or 4-8 oz.) Fabric: woven (denim, serge, velvet, flannel, wool…) Stretch factor*: 10-15 % with 1 to 2 % max elastane Pictures Credit: @atelierscammit ( https://www.

item.title: Things to sew
item.description: Blazer https://readytosew.fr/en/women-pdf/17-joe-blazer.html: in dark copper cordoroy. A slim-fit tailored jacket with some classic features. The jacket is lined, partially interfaced and has princess seams.

item.title: Weiland tank top
item.description: https://elbetextiles.com.au/products/weiland-tank-digital-sewing-pattern Suggested fabrics Main fabric: Medium to heavy weight stretch fabrics with 40% + stretch and good recovery 2 way stretch (fabric needs to stretch both horizontally and vertically.
